description:
Do you consider yourself a superhero and want to change the world? Blockchain might be the answer!

In this event, Mário Ribeiro Alves will help you to understand what blockchain is, the difference between blockchain and cryptocurrency and how it will impact our future.

No programming or technical knowledge needed. Just bring your superhero skills.

Not familiar with blockchain and cryptocurrencies? Great!
Come and join us to learn all about it!

The speaker: Mário Ribeiro Alves
Former PwC business consultant and investment banker.
Founder of Blockchain Center Portugal and ICO Advisor.
The best for Mário was to discover blockchain technology is the opportunity of a lifetime. Instead of watching it pass, he decided to grab it and help companies and individuals to thrive in the space.
name: How Blockchain can save the world
